title: Curious Chronicles
description: This web application fosters children's journaling, promoting well-being and personal growth. It uses a range of technologies and features customizable avatars, daily mood selection, and interactive prompts. Children engage through games and earn badges for participation.

title: Recipe Rewind
description: A web browser created using front and back end applications to allow the user to create an account, log into their profile, and add and delete their favorite recipes!

title: The Happy Hour
description: A web browser created for drinking enthusiast. Whether you are looking drinks you can make at home or a brewery in your local area, we can help you with all your drinking needs.

title: Note Taker
description: This web application is a simple note-taking tool that allows you to add and delete notes. To access the notes page, click 'Get Started' and you will be redirected. On the notes page, you can add a title and description to each note. To save a note, click the save button at the top left. To delete a note, simply click the red trash bin icon next to the note on the left.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This web application enables users to search for a city and access its current weather and 5-day forecast, including details like date, temperature, humidity, wind speed, and icons. It alerts users if a city is not found and retains a history of the 5 most recent searches for quick access to weather information.

title: Daily Planner
description: This application is a daily planner that will keep track of and save tasks in local storage. The hourly line will show a gray color if it's in the past, red if it's live, and green if it's in the future. The application will keep track of all tasks in a 9-5 workday schedule.
